text:
**Mighty Arm & Artisan Brick **❤️

Two **new collections** are here — both now available to trade on Portals Pre-Market.

**How to do it:**
– Go to My Gifts → Add
– Select Pre-Market → Mighty Arm / Artisan Brick
– Choose when it unlocks (we add 2 days by default for safety)

**And one more update** — Pre-Market collections now have their own section on top of the Collections menu, so you can find them instantly ❤️

[**Start trading early**](https://t.me/portals/market?startapp=)
